software.description:
MisterI (Mr. I) is a powerful and modular medical image viewer/editor. It should be particularly useful to Undergraduates, Postdocs and Researchers in Medical Imaging to visualize data and to easily make attractive figures (for papers or presentations). It will also in a near future offer a number of advanced algorithms for medical image processing. Look at the video to get an idea !

http://www.benoitscherrer.com/MisterI/vi...
